original_text:
For the Lord has chosen Jacob to be his own,
    Israel to be his treasured possession.
korean_text: 여호와께서 자기를 위하여 야곱 곧 이스라엘을 자기의 특별한 소유로 택하셨음이로다

sentences.original_text: For the Lord has chosen Jacob to be his own
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주께서 야곱을 자기 소유로 택하셨기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: Israel to be his treasured possession
